target.name: copy-resources
target.description: Copies various resources directories to the classes dir.

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes all files and dirs created by the build.

target.name: deps
target.fail: ${ant.project.name} requires Java 2 SDK 1.4 or greater to continue.

A valid J2SDK installation could not be found at: ${env.JAVA_HOME}
Please set the JAVA_HOME environment variable to point to the location of your J2SDK installation.

echo.message: javac destdir="@{dest}" fork="yes" debug="yes" debuglevel="${env.JAVADEBUG}" deprecation="yes" nowarn="no" source="1.4" srcdir="@{source.dir}" target="1.4" verbose="no"

target.name: jars
target.description: Generates jar files for each sub-component.
target.depends: all, jini-core.jar, jini-ext.jar, jsk-dl.jar, jsk-lib.jar, jsk-resources.jar, jsk-platform.jar, jsk-policy.jar, sun-util.jar, toolwrappers, browser.jar, browser-dl.jar, destroy.jar, fiddler.jar, fiddler-dl.jar, group.jar, group-dl.jar, mahalo.jar, mahalo-dl.jar, mercury.jar, mercury-dl.jar, norm.jar, norm-dl.jar, outrigger.jar, outrigger-dl.jar, outrigger-snaplogstore.jar, phoenix.jar, phoenix-dl.jar, phoenix-group.jar, phoenix-init.jar, reggie.jar, reggie-dl.jar, sdm-dl.jar, serviceui.jar, sharedvm.jar, start.jar, client.jar, mdprefld.jar, server.jar, server-act.jar, server-dl.jar

target.name: install.policy
target.description: Installs our policy jars into the JRE ext dir.

target.name: uninstall.policy
target.description: Removes our policy jars from the JRE ext dir.

target.name: stubs
target.description: Generates stub files for each sub-component.
target.depends: compile, browser.stubs, fiddler.stubs, mahalo.stubs, mercury.stubs, norm.stubs, outrigger.stubs, phoenix.stubs, reggie.stubs, sdm.stubs, start.stubs, hello.stubs

target.name: clean.all
target.description: Deletes the lib, lib-dl, and lib-ext directories.

target.name: clean.jars
target.description: Deletes the lib, lib-dl, and lib-ext directories.

target.name: toolwrappers
target.depends: tools.jar, checkconfigurationfile.jar, checkser.jar, classdep.jar, classserver.jar, computedigest.jar, computehttpmdcodebase.jar, jsk-debug-policy.jar, jarwrapper.jar, preferredlistgen.jar, envcheck.jar

fileset.includes: com/sun/jini/action/** com/sun/jini/admin/** com/sun/jini/collection/** com/sun/jini/config/** com/sun/jini/constants/** com/sun/jini/landlord/** com/sun/jini/lease/** com/sun/jini/logging/** com/sun/jini/lookup/entry/** com/sun/jini/proxy/** com/sun/jini/reliableLog/** com/sun/jini/resource/** com/sun/jini/system/** com/sun/jini/thread/**

target.name: configentry
target.depends: setup-all, browser.configentry, destroy.configentry, fiddler-activatable.configentry, fiddler-persistent.configentry, fiddler-transient.configentry, JoinManager.configentry, LeaseRenewalManager.configentry, LookupDiscovery.configentry, LookupLocatorDiscovery.configentry, mahalo-activatable.configentry, mahalo-persistent.configentry, mahalo-transient.configentry, mercury-activatable.configentry, mercury-persistent.configentry, mercury-transient.configentry, norm-activatable.configentry, norm-persistent.configentry, norm-transient.configentry, outrigger-activatable.configentry, outrigger-persistent.configentry, outrigger-transient.configentry, phoenix.configentry, phoenix-group.configentry, phoenix-stop.configentry, reggie-activatable.configentry, reggie-persistent.configentry, reggie-transient.configentry, ServiceDiscoveryManager.configentry, sharedgroup.configentry, start.configentry, WakeupManager.configentry

target.name: start.copy-resources
target.description: Copies various resources directories to the classes dir.

target.name: tools.copy-resources
target.description: Copies various resources directories to the classes dir.
